com.yworks.yfiles.view

Class HighlightIndicatorManager<T extends ILookup>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.ModelManager<T>
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.HighlightIndicatorManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the items.

    public class HighlightIndicatorManager<T extends ILookup>
extends ModelManager<T>
    A ModelManager implementation that manages the visual decorations of highlighted elements in a canvas.

    For each item that should be highlighted this class uses the ILookup mechanism of the items to lookup an IHighlightIndicatorInstaller implementation which will do the actual installation of the decoration in the canvas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighlightIndicatorManager(CanvasControl canvas)
      Creates an instance that for all selected items in the model dynamically installs a highlight decoration.

      Creates an instance that for all selected items in the model dynamically installs a highlight decoration.

      • getCanvasObjectGroup

        protected ICanvasObjectGroup getCanvasObjectGroup(T item)
        Callback used by ModelManager.install(Object) to retrieve the installer for a given item.

        This implementation always returns the HighlightGroup of the Canvas of this instance.

        Specified by:
        getCanvasObjectGroup in class ModelManager<T extends ILookup>
        Parameters:
        item - The item to find a canvas object group for.
        Returns:
        An ICanvasObjectGroup or null

      • getInstaller

        protected ICanvasObjectInstaller getInstaller(T item)
        Callback used by ModelManager.install(Object) to retrieve the installer for a given item.

        This implementation uses the ILookup.lookup(java.lang.Class) of the item to retrieve an IHighlightIndicatorInstaller instance.

        Specified by:
        getInstaller in class ModelManager<T extends ILookup>
        Parameters:
        item - The item to find an installer for.
        Returns:
        An installer or null

      • getSelectionModel

        public final ISelectionModel<T> getSelectionModel()
        Gets the selection model that determines which items are highlighted.

        May be null, in which case no elements are considered highlighted.

        Returns:
        The SelectionModel.
        See Also:
        setSelectionModel(ISelectionModel)
